faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers on ownership, quality control, and day-to-day usage

q1.q: Who owns images generated with PicSet AI?
q1.a: Under our terms and your lawful source assets, you retain usage rights for generated outputs. Ensure brand asset authorization where required.

q2.q: Will AI alter key product identity details?
q2.a: Default settings preserve core product characteristics. You can increase or reduce stylization through prompt controls.

q3.a: Yes. The flow is template-driven and designed for operators without formal design backgrounds.

q4.q: Do exports fit Amazon or Shopify standards?
q4.a: You can export by resolution and ratio. We still recommend final checks against each platform's latest listing policy.

q5.q: Why use PicSet AI instead of outsourcing?
q5.a: Speed, batch throughput, and style consistency are the main advantages for teams iterating frequently.

q6.q: What type of teams is PicSet AI best for?
q6.a: Cross-border sellers, e-commerce brands, content operations teams, and SMBs needing stable creative output.
